rules.description: Alfred, Finder & Marta, PDF Reader Pro, Alacritty

to.shell_command: ~/.local/bin/altr -w com.folded.menubar -t match_click -a 'Copy URL as Markdown'; sleep 0.5; ~/.local/bin/altr -w com.nyako520.chromehp -t chrome_share

rules.description: MOD → ⇪, MOD C/D/E → Select Input Method, MOD X → ⌫, MOD ` → ~, Paired Marks
􀆪 H/J/K/L/M → Move Window, 􀆪⌃ H/J/K/L → Extend Window, 􀆪⌃⌥ H/J/K/L → Contract Window, 􀆪⌘ H/J/K/L → Switch Window
⇪⌘ B → Bob, ⇪⌘ D → Define, ⇪⌘ E → DeHelper, ⇪⌘ F → Fantastical, ⇪⌘ H/L → Prev/Next Tab, ⇪⌘ M → Menu Bar Search, ⇪⌘ P → ChatGPT, ⇪⌘ W → Window Modes, ⇪⌘ ⇥ → Window Hints
✧ A → Launch Alfred, ✧ C → Merge Clipboard, ✧ D → Download, ✧ R → Reload Hammerspoon, ✧ S → Screenshot, ✧ V → Paste Plaintext, ✧ W → Close Without Save, ✧ ⇥ → List Windows

Hold ␣ B → Bitwarden, Hold ␣ G → Autojump, Hold ␣ J/K → Scroll ↑/↓, Hold ␣ M → Mailbox, Hold ␣ N → Mailbox Check New, Hold ␣ O → Obsidian Vault, Hold ␣ P → Podcasts, Hold ␣ T → Today, Hold ␣ W → Manage Window, Hold ␣ X → Manage Tmux, Hold ␣ \ → Control Center
Thumb H/J/K/L → Vim Navigation, Thumb O → ↵, Thumb 􀄦/􀄧 → Volume Up / Down
⇪ → ⎋, Hold ⇪ → ✧, ↵ ⌫ → ⌦, ↵ [ → Home Dir in Alfred, ↵ ] → Alfred Recent Path, Hold ⎋ → Force Quit, jh → Vim Mode

to.shell_command: STATE=$(defaults read com.apple.WindowManager GloballyEnabled 2> /dev/null);[[ ${STATE} = 0 ]] && ENABLE=true || ENABLE=false; defaults write com.apple.WindowManager GloballyEnabled -bool ${ENABLE}

rules.description: Alfred with Selection/ Clipboard/ Actions, Hold 􀆪 → Show Alfred
Alfred Clipboard Manager, Lft⌘ C A/S/D/F → Copy Clip
